keyBenefits.title: Key
keyBenefits.description: Transform your cybersecurity training with our innovative approach designed for the modern workforce

understandableTraining.title: Understandable Training
understandableTraining.description: Short, interactive lessons that keep employees engaged and help them remember what really matters.

fitsEachRole.title: Fits Each Role
fitsEachRole.description: Content tailored to different jobs, so every employee learns the skills most relevant to their work.

clearReports.title: Clear Reports & Insights
clearReports.description: See who's improving, spot weak points, and track overall progress with simple dashboards.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose
whyChoose.description: Discover the advantages that set us apart in cybersecurity training

highEngagement.title: High Engagement
highEngagement.benefit: Interactive content ensures maximum employee retention.

roleBased.title: Role-Based Training
roleBased.benefit: Personalized paths deliver highly relevant education.

automation.title: Campaign Automation
automation.benefit: Automated schedules save time and ensure coverage.

reporting.title: Actionable Reporting
reporting.benefit: Clear dashboards focus efforts on high-risk areas.

cta.title: Ready to
cta.subtitle: Don't wait for the next breach. Schedule a personalized demo to see how SECURESIST delivers measurable, human-layer security intelligence across your organization.

footer.description: Transform your organization's cybersecurity posture with intelligent, role-based training that keeps your team engaged and secure.

about.title: About
about.description: At Meta Techs, we recognize that the greatest defense against cyber threats is your people. We are dedicated to providing the tools and knowledge necessary to transform every employee into an active defender.

solution.title: Our Solution:
solution.description1: We created **SECURESIST**, our all-in-one cybersecurity awareness platform, to bridge the gap between technical security and human behavior.
solution.description2: SECURESIST helps organizations of all sizes build a **strong security culture** by turning employees from potential targets into **active defenders** through engaging, personalized, and effective training modules.

empowering.title: Empowering Teams
empowering.description: To make cybersecurity simple, engaging, and effective for every business, empowering teams with confidence.

expert.title: Expert-Led
expert.description: Developed by certified cybersecurity specialists with deep industry expertise.

people.title: People-First
people.description: Easy-to-follow, gamified training that speaks plain language, driving real behavior change.

cta.title: Ready to Meet Your Cybersecurity Goals?
cta.description: Request a free demo and see the SECURESIST difference for yourself.
